query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `email_notification_preferences` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `applicant_email` varchar(320) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `status_updates` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `interview_scheduling` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `document_uploads` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `general_updates` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `marketing_emails` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `email_notification_preferences_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
